## Setup

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(naniar)
library(DataExplorer)
library(summarytools)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
df <- read_delim('./steam_games.csv', delim = ';')
```

## Inspect Dataest

### Understand data

```{r}
df |> 
  glimpse()
```
### Rename columns

```{r}
df_renamed_columns <- df |> 
  clean_names() |> 
  rename(
    id = app_id,
    description = short_description,
    concurrent_users = ccu
  )
```

## Check data quality

### Missing Data

```{r}
df_renamed_columns |> 
  slice_sample(n = 10000) |> 
  vis_miss()
```

### Duplicate Data

```{r}
df_renamed_columns |> 
  get_dupes(id)
```
